entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
